item.description: In a nutshell In deck settings, set the New Interval under the Lapses tab to make the new interval of forgotten cards a percentage of their previous interval. item.description: In a Nutshell For each deck options group in Anki, set the initial ease factor to the average ease factor of the mature cards in that deck options group.
